text: Dhak Khurampur is a village in Phagwara Tehsil in Kapurthala district of Punjab State, India. It is located from Kapurthala, from Phagwara. The village is administrated by a Sarpanch, who is an elected representative. == Demography == According to the report published by Census India in 2011, Dhak Khurampur has 9 houses with the total population of 50 persons of which 26 are male and 24 females. Literacy rate of Dhak Khurampur is 70.00%, lower than the state average of 75.84%. The population of children in the age group 0–6 years is 10 which is 20.00% of the total population. Child sex ratio is approximately 667, lower than the state average of 846. == Population data == {|class="wikitable sortable" ! Particulars !! Total !!
